name: dezent
description: Powerful pattern matching and parsing that's readable, recursive, and structured.

scripts.dist: npm run compile && chmod +x dist/dezent_cli.js && jest dist/Parser.test.js
scripts.test-debug: npm run compile-debug && node ./node_modules/.bin/jest ./test/Parser.test.js --runInBand -t 'boolean / null outputs'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run dist && git remote update && echo 'Verifying local repo is same as remote...' && git diff --no-ext-diff --quiet --exit-code

author: Neil Mix <neilmix@gmail.com>
